name: Grimguard Tactics
summary:
Grimguard Tactics is an epic, dark fantasy RPG strategy game with an expansive Hero summon and simple easy to learn turn-based tactics gameplay.

The Primorva, an ancient evil has awoken from the shadows. To free the world of Terenos you must summon and bring together its most powerful, legendary, and dangerous heroes in attempt to drive back the oncoming darkness. In battle you'll forge unlikely alliances and assemble an epic team of the greatest heroes this world has ever seen!
